entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:15 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 12:15 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
